channel.title: Need help to put my server online!
channel.description: hi, everything is fine on my computer, but when i sent the client to a friend, he was unable to log in.. I did everything, port forwarding, i oppened the 43594 port, i changed every ip adress in client.java and gui.java to my no-ip server and i dont have more idea what to do now.. I tried to play with an other computer in my house and it work..??

item.title: Need help to put my server online!
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

[quote=“Xi ShiFt iX, post:20, topic:448599”]Well i’m on now.

It works :[/quote]

ok thx! your name was pulse right? maybe the problem is from my friend computer… any idea what to do on his computer?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to put my server online!

item.title: Need help to put my server online!
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

do you think the problem was this…?

try { java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept(); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if ( /* * connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || * connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1") */true) { if (connectingHost.contains("74-129-182-147.dhcp.insightbb.com")) { misc.println("Checking Server Status..."); s.close(); } else { connections.add(connectingHost); if (checkHost(connectingHost)) { misc.println("Connection from " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort()); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); } else { misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort()); s.close(); } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to put my server online!

item.title: Need help to put my server online!
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

Clawz Own U:

the sources ip should be 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 and if ur friends want to use client the client ip has to be ur no-ip 1. and if ur playing with client the client ip should be 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 or ur no-ip.

where can i find the source ip? i think i have a delta client

Read full topic

item.title: Need help to put my server online!
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

tomato721:

you need to give him your external ip which is what it says on ur no-ip

Lmao? that makes no sense, you would use your No-ip likeee…

Moparscape.no-ip.biz and replace anything that has 127.0.0.1 or any other ip’s to match your no-ip.

item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

lol, chances are you are connecting to a localhost = 127.0.0.1 that’s probably the reason your friend cant connect and you can. Localhost = offline for others but online for you basically.

Ot: Try looking for 127.0.0.1
